name: Tetruff's Word Adventure
description:
Woof!

Join Tetruff on a word adventure! Make words from jumbled blocks of letters shaped like tetrominoes. Teach Tetruff new words each time you play. It's so easy to make words, you might even find some you didn't know! Just a warning, Tetruff can get peckish and may start to chomp on the board, but don't let that stop you!

Features
  • Words are automatically highlighted when they're made.
  • Longer words clear adjacent letters and bones.
  • Record high scores in three game modes.
Minimum Requirements
  • 1.8Ghz Dual-Core Intel Core i5
  • Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • 4GB RAM
